title: I can’t pay bills using GCash. What do I do?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [I can’t pay bills using GCash. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30283132306329-I-can-t-pay-bills-using-GCash-What-do-I-do)
- [I did not receive my top-up after using Bills. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/43474227595417-I-did-not-receive-my-top-up-after-using-Bills-What-do-I-do)
- [My GCash bill payment was not posted or confirmed by the biller. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30283229084185-My-GCash-bill-payment-was-not-posted-or-confirmed-by-the-biller-What-do-I-do)
- [I was charged multiple times for my bills payment. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30283455559449-I-was-charged-multiple-times-for-my-bills-payment-What-do-I-do)
- [I entered the wrong details when paying my bills with GCash. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30283468296089-I-entered-the-wrong-details-when-paying-my-bills-with-GCash-What-do-I-do)
- [My GCash bills payment failed. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/43589087034265-My-GCash-bills-payment-failed-What-do-I-do)
- [How much is the transaction fee for my bills payment in GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30283568397849-How-much-is-the-transaction-fee-for-my-bills-payment-in-GCash)
- [I can't save scheduled bills or favorite billers. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30283642636697-I-can-t-save-scheduled-bills-or-favorite-billers-What-do-I-do)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

If you're encountering problems while paying your bill through GCash, try these steps:

1. **Restart the app** and check your **internet connection**
2. [Troubleshoot common GCash app issues](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38910877046937-How-to-troubleshoot-GCash-app-issues)
3. Ensure you have **enough funds** in your GCash Wallet
4. **Check if your biller is currently down or under maintenance**. Billers that are **grayed out** in the app are temporarily unavailable.

See available and unavailable biller examples below:

**Biller Available:**

![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/43588595847449)

**Biller Not Available**

![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/43588611738521)

5. Check if you've **exceeded your** [GCash Transaction Limit](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360021112894-What-are-my-GCash-Wallet-and-Transaction-Limits); it refreshes at the start of each month

If you’re not sure if your payment went through, visit [“My GCash bill payment was not posted or confirmed. What do I do?”](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30283229084185-My-GCash-bill-payment-was-not-posted-or-confirmed-by-the-biller-What-do-I-do#:~:text=If%20your%20payment%20has%20not,Your%20payment%20went%20through%20successfully.) for more information.

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [How do I pay my bills using GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900004373166)
- [How much is the transaction fee for my bills payment in GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30283568397849)
- [I entered the wrong details when paying my bills with GCash. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30283468296089)
- [I was charged multiple times for my bills payment. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30283455559449)
- [I can't save scheduled bills or favorite billers. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30283642636697)
